And after his apostasy, [CANRIGHT LEFT THE SEVENTH-DAY ADVENTIST CHURCH PERMANENTLY IN FEBRUARY, 1887.] why need you say the things in regard to him you have? God did not treat apostates in this way, and if you had anything to say, say it without putting such things in the paper. I tell you, brethren, I am troubled when I see you take positions that you forbid others 
                                                                           35
to take and that you would condemn in others. I do not think this is the right way to deal with one another.
